"$:/plugins/ajh/randombackground/random.js": { "text": "/*\
title: $:/plugins/ajh/randombackground/random.js
type: application/javascript
module-type: startup

Setup the root widget to update $:/temp/random with the tiddler title that has the path to the background.

\*/
(function () {

/*jslint node: true, browser: true */
/*global $tw: false */
'use strict';

// Export name and synchronous status
exports.name = 'random';
exports.after = ['startup'];
exports.before = ['rootwidget'];
exports.synchronous = true;

exports.startup = function() {
 var bg=$tw.wiki.getTiddlerText('$:/info/background')||'$:/plugins/ajh/randombackground/background';
 var max=$tw.wiki.getTiddlerText('$:/info/max-random')||0;
 var min=$tw.wiki.getTiddlerText('$:/info/min-random')||0;
 var t=bg+((Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min + 1)) + min).toString());
 var tiddler=$tw.wiki.getTiddler(t);
 var ba=tiddler.fields['attachment']||$tw.wiki.getTiddlerText('$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/backgroundimageattachment');
 var bs=tiddler.fields['size']||$tw.wiki.getTiddlerText('$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/backgroundimagesize');
 $tw.wiki.addTiddler(new $tw.Tiddler({title: '$:/temp/random', text: t, attachment: ba, size: bs}));
};

})();", "type": "application/javascript", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/randombackground/random.js", "module-type": "startup" },
"$:/plugins/ajh/randombackground/readme": { "text": "This plugin replaces the page background image with a random one upon each refresh. Name the background tiddlers ~$:/plugins/ajh/randombackground/background# where # is a whole number between 0 and what is in ~$:/info/max-random. For example: ~$:/plugins/ajh/randombackground/background0, ~$:/plugins/ajh/randombackground/background1, ~$:/plugins/ajh/randombackground/background2, etc.

Add the ''attachment'' field with value of ''fixed'' or ''scroll'' and/or the ''size'' field with value of ''auto'', ''cover'', or ''contain'' for each background individually and it will supersede the global setting for that background.

Simply drag $:/plugins/ajh/randombackground to the top of your tiddlywiki display, save and reload. Then add as many backgrounds as you would like.

This plugin comprises:

* JavaScript code module
* Stylesheet
* Default background", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/randombackground/readme" },
"$:/plugins/ajh/randombackground/stylesheet": { "text": "\define random-background-datauri()
<$set name='background' value={{$:/temp/random}}>
<$list filter='[<background>is[image]]'>
`background: url(`
<$list filter='[<background>!has[_canonical_uri]]'>
<$macrocall $name='datauri' title={{$:/temp/random}}/>
</$list>
<$list filter='[<background>has[_canonical_uri]]'>
<$view tiddler={{$:/temp/random}} field='_canonical_uri'/>
</$list>
`) center center;`
`background-attachment: `{{$:/temp/random!!attachment}}`;
-webkit-background-size:` {{$:/temp/random!!size}}`;
-moz-background-size:` {{$:/temp/random!!size}}`;
-o-background-size:` {{$:/temp/random!!size}}`;
background-size:` {{$:/temp/random!!size}}`;`
</$list>
</$set>
\end

body.tc-body {
	<<random-background-datauri>>
}", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/randombackground/stylesheet", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "caption": "Random Background" } } }
